channel.title: Slayer
channel.description: On my server, you have to use chests to get slayer exp.. so i added some slayer npcs. I took out the chests and i want the npcs to give exp after they die. Well i added addskillexp bla bla thing after the npc. But all you gota do is press attack and you get the exp. I want it to give you the exp after there dead. Help please?

@mylust4blood wrote:

shit umm…if i were u i would do this i would make it so when u kill a npc u get teled to chest and u can click it once and u get xp if not u need to change the xp giving in client or npc handler
